name: acro-bike
effect: Increases movement speed outside or in caves. Slower than the mach bike. Can perform various tricks, allowing the trainer to reach certain special areas.
short_effect: More maneuverable than the Mach Bike, and allows hopping along rails.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This folding Bike allows you to perform actions such as wheelies and bunny hops.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This folding Bike allows you to perform actions such as wheelies and bunny hops.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This folding Bike allows you to perform actions such as wheelies and bunny hops.
